verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <WH7969> In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> of the reign בֵּלְאשַׁצַּ֣ר <WH1112> Belshazzar הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of king חָז֞וֹן <WH2377> a vision נִרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> appeared אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אֲנִ֣י <WH589> to me דָנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> unto me [even unto] me Daniel אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after הַנִּרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> that which appeared אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me בַּתְּחִלָּֽה׃ <WH8462> unto me at the first

וָֽאֶרְאֶה֮ <WH7200> And I saw בֶּחָזוֹן֒ <WH2377> in a vision וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בִּרְאֹתִ֔י <WH7200> and it came to pass when I saw וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> myself בְּשׁוּשַׁ֣ן <WH7800> that I [was] at Shushan הַבִּירָ֔ה <WH1002> [in] the palace אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּעֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> of Elam הַמְּדִינָ֑ה <WH4082> which [is] in the province וָאֶרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> and I saw בֶּֽחָז֔וֹן <WH2377> in a vision וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> myself הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> was beside אוּבַ֥ל <WH180> and I was by the river אוּלָֽי׃ <WH195> of Ulai

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> Then I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> mine eyes וָאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> and saw וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> and behold אַ֣יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> a עֹמֵ֛ד <WH5975> and behold there stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָאֻבָ֖ל <WH180> the river וְל֣וֹ קְרָנָ֑יִם <WH7161> which had [two] horns וְהַקְּרָנַ֣יִם <WH7161> and the [two] horns גְּבֹה֗וֹת <WH1364> [were] high וְהָאַחַת֙ <WH259> but one גְּבֹהָ֣ה <WH1364> [was] higher מִן־ <WH4480> than הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> than the other וְהַ֨גְּבֹהָ֔ה <WH1364> and the higher עֹלָ֖ה <WH5927> came up בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <WH314> last

רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֡יִל <WH352> the ram מְנַגֵּחַ֩ <WH5055> pushing יָ֨מָּה <WH3220> westward וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> and northward וָנֶ֗גְבָּה <WH5045> and southward וְכָל־ <WH3605> no חַיּוֹת֙ <WH2416> so that no beasts לֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יַֽעַמְד֣וּ <WH5975> might stand לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> nor מַצִּ֖יל <WH5337> him neither [was there any] that could deliver מִיָּד֑וֹ <WH3027> out of his hand וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> but he did כִרְצֹנ֖וֹ <WH7522> according to his will וְהִגְדִּֽיל׃ <WH1431> and became great

וַאֲנִ֣י ׀ <WH589> I הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> become מֵבִ֗ין <WH995> And as I was considering וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold צְפִיר־ <WH6842> goat הָֽעִזִּים֙ <WH5795> behold an he בָּ֤א <WH935> came מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמַּעֲרָב֙ <WH4628> from the west עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> on the face כָל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the whole earth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> without נוֹגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> and touched בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> not the ground וְהַ֨צָּפִ֔יר <WH6842> and the goat קֶ֥רֶן <WH7161> horn חָז֖וּת <WH2380> [had] a notable בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> between his eyes

וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> And he came עַד־ <WH5704> up הָאַ֙יִל֙ <WH352> to the ram בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> that had הַקְּרָנַ֔יִם <WH7161> [two] horns אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which רָאִ֔יתִי <WH7200> which I had seen עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> standing לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָאֻבָ֑ל <WH180> the river וַיָּ֥רָץ <WH7323> and ran אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about בַּחֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> unto him in the fury כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <WH3581> of his power

וּרְאִיתִ֞יו <WH7200> And I saw מַגִּ֣יעַ ׀ <WH5060> him come אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> close unto הָאַ֗יִל <WH352> the ram וַיִּתְמַרְמַ֤ר <WH4843> and he was moved with choler אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> at וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> against him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> the ram וַיְשַׁבֵּר֙ <WH7665> and brake אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> his two קְרָנָ֔יו <WH7161> horns וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had כֹ֛חַ <WH3581> and there was no power בָּאַ֖יִל <WH352> in the ram לַעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> to stand לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤הוּ <WH7993> him but he cast him down אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> to the ground וַֽיִּרְמְסֵ֔הוּ <WH7429> and stamped וְלֹא־ <WH3808> none הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> had מַצִּ֛יל <WH5337> upon him and there was none that could deliver לָאַ֖יִל <WH352> the ram מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> out of his hand

וּצְפִ֥יר <WH6842> Therefore the he הָעִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> goat הִגְדִּ֣יל <WH1431> great עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> waxed very וּכְעָצְמ֗וֹ <WH6105> and when he was strong נִשְׁבְּרָה֙ <WH7665> was broken הַקֶּ֣רֶן <WH7161> horn הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> the great וַֽתַּעֲלֶ֜נָה <WH5927> and for it came up חָז֤וּת <WH2380> notable ones אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> four תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <WH8478> place לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> toward the four רוּח֥וֹת <WH7307> winds הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven

וּמִן־ <WH4480> Out הָאַחַ֣ת <WH259> And out of one מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> of them יָצָ֥א <WH3318> of them came forth קֶֽרֶן־ <WH7161> horn אַחַ֖ת <WH259> of one מִצְּעִירָ֑ה <WH4704> a little וַתִּגְדַּל־ <WH1431> great יֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> which waxed exceeding אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַנֶּ֥גֶב <WH5045> toward the south וְאֶל־ <WH413> toward הַמִּזְרָ֖ח <WH4217> and toward the east וְאֶל־ <WH413> and toward הַצֶּֽבִי׃ <WH6643> and toward the pleasant

וַתִּגְדַּ֖ל <WH1431> And it waxed great עַד־ <WH5704> up צְבָ֣א <WH6635> [even] to the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַתַּפֵּ֥ל <WH5307> and it cast down אַ֛רְצָה <WH776> to the ground מִן־ <WH4480> some הַצָּבָ֥א <WH6635> [some] of the host וּמִן־ <WH4480> and some הַכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> and of the stars וַֽתִּרְמְסֵֽם׃ <WH7429> and stamped

וְעַ֥ד <WH5704> even שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> [himself] even to the prince הַצָּבָ֖א <WH6635> of the host הִגְדִּ֑יל <WH1431> Yea he magnified וּמִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> at [הֵרִים כ] (הוּרַ֣ם <WH7311> bring up ק) הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> and by him the daily וְהֻשְׁלַ֖ךְ <WH7993> was cast down מְכ֥וֹן <WH4349> and the place מִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH4720> of his sanctuary

וְצָבָ֛א <WH6635> And an host תִּנָּתֵ֥ן <WH5414> was given עַל־ <WH5921> along הַתָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> [him] against the daily בְּפָ֑שַׁע <WH6588> [sacrifice] by reason of transgression וְתַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> and it cast down אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> the truth אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> and it practised וְהִצְלִֽיחָה׃ <WH6743> and prospered

וָאֶשְׁמְעָ֥ה <WH8085> Then I heard אֶֽחָד־ <WH259> one קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> saint מְדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> speaking וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> and another קָד֜וֹשׁ <WH6918> saint לַפַּֽלְמוֹנִ֣י <WH6422> unto that certain הַֽמְדַבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> [saint] which spake עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֞י <WH4970> How הֶחָז֤וֹן <WH2377> How long [shall be] the vision הַתָּמִיד֙ <WH8548> [concerning] the daily וְהַפֶּ֣שַׁע <WH6588> [sacrifice] and the transgression שֹׁמֵ֔ם <WH8074> of desolation תֵּ֛ת <WH5414> to give וְקֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> both the sanctuary וְצָבָ֖א <WH6635> and the host מִרְמָֽס׃ <WH4823> tread -ing

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about עַ֚ד <WH5704> against עֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> evenings בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> mornings אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> unto me Unto two thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְנִצְדַּ֖ק <WH6663> be cleansed קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> then shall the sanctuary

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become בִּרְאֹתִ֛י <WH7200> had seen אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I דָנִיֵּ֖אל <WH1840> And it came to pass when I [even] I Daniel אֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָז֑וֹן <WH2377> the vision וָאֲבַקְשָׁ֣ה <WH1245> and sought בִינָ֔ה <WH998> for the meaning וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> then behold there stood לְנֶגְדִּ֖י <WH5048> before כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> before me as the appearance גָֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> of a man

וָאֶשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> And I heard קוֹל־ <WH6963> voice אָדָ֖ם <WH120> a man's בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between אוּלָ֑י <WH195> between [the banks of] Ulai וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> which called וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said גַּבְרִיאֵ֕ל <WH1403> Gabriel הָבֵ֥ן <WH995> [man] to understand לְהַלָּ֖ז <WH1975> make this אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> the vision

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> So he came אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> near עָמְדִ֔י <WH5975> abide וּבְבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> and when he came נִבְעַ֔תִּי <WH1204> I was afraid וָאֶפְּלָ֖ה <WH5307> and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> upon my face וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> but he said אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about הָבֵ֣ן <WH995> unto me Understand בֶּן־ <WH1121> O son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעֶת־ <WH6256> for at the time קֵ֥ץ <WH7093> of the end הֶחָזֽוֹן׃ <WH2377> [shall be] the vision

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <WH1696> Now as he was speaking עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with נִרְדַּ֥מְתִּי <WH7290> with me I was in a deep sleep עַל־ <WH5921> with פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> on my face אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> toward the ground וַיִּ֨גַּע־ <WH5060> but he touched בִּ֔י וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֖נִי <WH5975> me and set עַל־ <WH5921> and עָמְדִֽי׃ <WH5975> stand

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold מוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֔ <WH3045> Behold I will make thee know אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will occur בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> what shall be in the last end הַזָּ֑עַם <WH2195> of the indignation כִּ֖י <WH3588> for pertains לְמוֹעֵ֥ד <WH4150> for at the time appointed קֵֽץ׃ <WH7093> the end

הָאַ֥יִל <WH352> The ram אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which רָאִ֖יתָ <WH7200> which thou sawest בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> having הַקְּרָנָ֑יִם <WH7161> [two] horns מַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> [are] the kings מָדַ֥י <WH4074> of Media וּפָרָֽס׃ <WH6539> and Persia

וְהַצָּפִ֥יר <WH6842> goat הַשָּׂעִ֖יר <WH8163> And the rough מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> [is] the king יָוָ֑ן <WH3120> of Grecia וְהַקֶּ֤רֶן <WH7161> horn הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> and the great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is בֵּין־ <WH996> between עֵינָ֔יו <WH5869> that [is] between his eyes ה֖וּא <WH1931> he הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> [is] the first

וְהַ֨נִּשְׁבֶּ֔רֶת <WH7665> Now that being broken וַתַּֽעֲמֹ֥דְנָה <WH5975> stood up אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> whereas four תַּחְתֶּ֑יהָ <WH8478> place אַרְבַּ֧ע <WH702> for it four מַלְכֻי֛וֹת <WH4438> kingdoms מִגּ֥וֹי <WH1471> out of the nation יַעֲמֹ֖דְנָה <WH5975> shall stand up וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not בְכֹחֽוֹ׃ <WH3581> but not in his power

וּֽבְאַחֲרִית֙ <WH319> And in the latter time מַלְכוּתָ֔ם <WH4438> of their kingdom כְּהָתֵ֖ם <WH8552> are come to the full הַפֹּשְׁעִ֑ים <WH6586> when the transgressors יַעֲמֹ֛ד <WH5975> shall stand up מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> a king עַז־ <WH5794> of fierce פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> countenance וּמֵבִ֥ין <WH995> and understanding חִידֽוֹת׃ <WH2420> dark sentences

וְעָצַ֤ם <WH6105> shall be mighty כֹּחוֹ֙ <WH3581> And his power וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> by בְכֹח֔וֹ <WH3581> but not by his own power וְנִפְלָא֥וֹת <WH6381> wonderfully יַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> and he shall destroy וְהִצְלִ֣יחַ <WH6743> and shall prosper וְעָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> and practise וְהִשְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> and shall destroy עֲצוּמִ֖ים <WH6099> the mighty וְעַם־ <WH5971> people קְדֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH6918> and the holy
